invocations.description: Returns a table containing various information about spell spell which can be the spell name or the incantation words as defined in the '/tibiadata/spells.xml' file.
invocations.ex:
local spell = spellinfo('exura')
for i,j in pairs(spell) do
	print(i, j)
end
invocations.exDescription: Will print all of the information the bot has about 'Light Healing' spell.
